sense.name: a quantity sufficient for satisfaction
sense.examples: The children ate their fill of candy on Halloween. We could never get our fill of diving in the warm clear waters. John said he's had his fill of surprised for one day. (ironic intent)

sense.name: any substance used to fill a space or container
sense.examples: You need more potting fill for this window box. The fill in these pillows is some type of polyester.

sense.name: the act of shading in color into an area
sense.examples: The artist's fill of the background with purple hues created a brooding effect.

sense.name: a short musical phrase performed by an instrument in a popular song
sense.examples: I like the saxophone fill on that song between the verses. He performed the piece with a drum fill at the end of the song.
